name: Mountain Hill Climb Rally
description:
Get ready for a hill drifting challenge! Race to the top of mountain!

Drive your 4x4 Jeep to climb the mountain hill. Control your vehicle carefully, don't let it reverse from mountain way!

The control is easy. Press the right screen to turn right and press the left screen to turn left. Press the left and right screen at the same time to brake.

Come and play Mountain Hill Climb Rally now. This is one of the very addictive physics based running game and its FREE! (NO in app purchases)

Drifting and Running on top of the hill to go up and climb on the racing track as quick as you can! Challenge your friends on the racing track!

Features:

Absolutely stunning 3D environment
Amazing realistic car physics
Addictive game play
Easy game controls
